critique: The document is a presidential order to close executive departments and governmental agencies early on September 17, 1937, to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the signing of the Constitution. It affects federal employees in the District of Columbia and the field service, with exceptions for those whose duties are essential or whose absence would violate existing law. The order specifies that employees working in shifts are to be excused after four hours of work. There is nothing about Ideological Tilt, Immigration Approach, Executive Power, Federalism, Security vs. Liberty, Economic Regulation and Social Inclusion.
